General.Name: NatureCell Co.Ltd
General.Description: NatureCell Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells canned and health functional food products, beverages, stem cell, and cosmetics in South Korea and internationally. The company's products comprise fruit drinks, aloe vera drinks, coffee, energy drinks, and Korean sauces, as well as offers domestic products and ETC products under the SAMMI and OEM brands. It also provides services for the preservation of blood cells, such as endothelial progenitor cells, mononuclear cells, and platelet rich plasma products. The company was formerly known as RNL Sammi CO., Ltd. and changed its name to NatureCell Co.,Ltd. in April 2013. NatureCell Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1960 and is based in Seoul, South Korea.
